params.name: heading
params.description: Text to use within the heading of the card component. If `headingHtml` is provided, the `heading` argument will be ignored.

params.name: headingHtml
params.description: HTML to use within the heading of the card component. If `headingHtml` is provided, the `heading` argument will be ignored.

params.name: headingClasses
params.description: Classes to add to the card heading.

params.name: headingLevel
params.description: Optional heading level for the card heading. Default: 2

params.name: href
params.description: The value of the card link href attribute.

params.name: clickable
params.description: If set to true, then the whole Card will become a clickable Card variant.

params.name: feature
params.description: If set to true, then the Card will become a feature Card variant.

params.name: imgURL
params.description: The URL of the image in the card.

params.name: imgALT
params.description: The alternative text of the image in the card.

params.name: description
params.description: Text description within the card content. If `descriptionHtml` is provided, the `description` argument will be ignored.

params.name: descriptionHtml
params.description: HTML to use within the card content. If `descriptionHtml` is provided, the `description` argument will be ignored.

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the card.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the card.
